permissions: Allowed for admins, or users who are managers of the material supplier or members of the broker for the related material type (delegated via material_type relationship).
side_effects: Updates a material type unavailability record.
validation_notes: Requires material type unavailability ID argument. At least one attribute flag must be provided. start-at/end-at are ISO 8601 timestamps (example: 2025-01-02T00:00:00Z). If start-at is provided, end-at must be greater than start-at. Unavailability cannot overlap existing unavailabilities for the material type when time bounds change. Material type cannot have overlapping job production plans in the specified window. At least one of start-at or end-at must be present on the record.
